text: In this video, we will show you

how to install the simple
trainer mod for GTA V.

This mod allows players
to use cheats in the game

such as teleportation,
spawning in cars or weapons,
changing time or weather, and more.
Before installing, keep in mind
that GTA V mods should only be used
in single-player mode.
Rockstar Studios bans players
they detect with modded clients
from playing GTA online.
To start, locate where you have GTA V
located on your computer.
Keep this folder open in the background.

Next, go to this website, also
linked in the description.
Download the client.
Extract the contents of the zip file.
Then copy all the contents

except the trainer file,
labeled NativeTrainer.asi.
Paste them into the main directory
where GTA V is downloaded.

Then go to gta5-mods.com
and search "simple trainer."

Click "Download," then
click "Download" again.
Open the downloaded package,

and you'll see TrainerV.asi
and another trainer file,
which is a .ini file.

Copy and paste both into
GTA V's main directory.
Once you launch GTA V, press F3
to start using your newly installed mod.
Use the number pad to navigate the menu.
